TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BindingManagerBase extends System.Object

summary.span: 管理繫結至相同資料來源和資料成員的所有 物件。

span.span: Manages all objects that are bound to the same data source and data member.

summary.span: 這個類別是抽象的。

span.span: This class is abstract.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可讓 Windows Form 上的資料繫結控制項繫結至相同的資料來源的同步處理。The enables the synchronization of data-bound controls on a Windows Form that are bound to the same data source. (如需簡單的控制項繫結至資料來源的詳細資訊，請參閱類別。)例如，假設表單包含兩個相同的資料來源，但不同的資料行繫結的控制項。(For more information about simple binding a control to a data source, see the class.) For example, suppose that a form contains two controls that are bound to the same data source but to different columns. 資料來源可能是，其中包含客戶的名稱，而資料行可能包含第一個和最後一個名稱。The data source might be a that contains customer names, while the columns might contain the first and last names. 必須同步處理兩個控制項，以顯示正確的第一個和最後一個名稱，以相同的客戶。The two controls must be synchronized in order to display the correct first and last names together for the same customer. ，後者繼承自類別，藉由維護目前的項目中的資料來源的指標會完成這項同步處理。The , which inherits from the class, accomplishes this synchronization by maintaining a pointer to the current item in the data source. 控制項的繫結到目前的項目使它們顯示相同的資料列的資訊。The controls are bound to the current item so they display the information for the same row. 當目前的項目變更時，通知所有繫結控制項，好讓它們可以重新整理其資料。When the current item changes, the notifies all the bound controls so that they can refresh their data. 此外，您可以設定屬性來指定中的資料列控制項指向。Furthermore, you can set the property to specify the row in the that the controls point to. 若要判斷資料來源中的多少資料列存在，請使用屬性。To determine how many rows exist in the data source, use the property. 是必要的因為資料來源不一定會維護目前項目指標。The is necessary because data sources do not necessarily maintain a current-item pointer. 例如，陣列和物件可以是資料來源，但它們之間沒有屬性，可傳回目前的項目。For instance, arrays and objects can be data sources, but they do not have a property that returns the current item. 若要取得目前的項目，請使用屬性。To get the current item, use the property. 也會繼承，而且它用來維護之目前屬性的物件，而不是資料來源中的目前物件的屬性。The also inherits from the , and it is used to maintain the current property of an object, rather than the property of a current object in a data source. 基於這個理由，嘗試設定或屬性沒有任何作用。For this reason, trying to set the or property for a has no effect. 若要建立，使用類別，會傳回或，視受管理的資料來源。To create a , use the class, which returns either a or a , depending on the data source being managed. 方案的程式設計人員會鼓勵直接繫結控制項至元件，可做為資料來源和實際的目標資料來源的資料連接器。Solutions programmers are encouraged to bind controls directly to a component, which acts as both a data source and data connector to the actual target data source. 大幅簡化了這兩個簡單和複雜資料繫結，包括管理控制項和其目標之間的貨幣。 greatly simplifies both simple and complex data binding, including managing currency between the control and its target. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用傳回特定資料來源。The following code example uses the to return a for a specific data source. (這個範例假設您已經宣告`myBindingManagerBase`宣告區段的模組中。)然後此範例會將事件委派至和事件。(The example assumes you have declared `myBindingManagerBase` in the Declarations section of the module.) The example then adds event delegates to the and events. 最後，此範例包含四種方法 (`MoveNext`， `MovePrevious`， `MoveFirst`，和`MoveLast`) 的遞增或遞減屬性，以及組清單中第一個或最後一個資料列。Lastly, the example contains four methods (`MoveNext`, `MovePrevious`, `MoveFirst`, and `MoveLast`) that increment or decrement the property, and set the to the first or last row in the list. 在清單中的最後一個資料列由使用屬性。The last row in the list is determined by using the property. [!code-cpp[Classic BindingManagerBase Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingManagerBase Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic BindingManagerBase Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingManagerBase Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic BindingManagerBase Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingManagerBase Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

para.span: 當您繼承自，您必須覆寫下列的抽象成員： ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ，和。

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設建構函式集屬性`null`。The default constructor sets the property to `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddNew() cil managed

summary.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，加入新項目至基礎清單中。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, adds a new item to the underlying list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將加入新項目加入基礎清單的項目類型使用預設建構函式。The method adds a new item to the underlying list by using the default constructor for that item's type. 主要被為了供程式設計人員將複雜資料繫結支援加入至其自訂元件。 is intended primarily to be used by programmers adding complex data-binding support to their custom component. 通常會實作使用以下模式，可讓應用程式設計人員將自己的程式碼建立自訂項目： is commonly implemented using the following pattern that allows application programmers to inject their own code for creating customized items: 1. 會引發 事件。 raises the event. 2. 程式設計人員可以提供自訂的項目，藉由處理事件及設定屬性參數，以新的項目。The programmer can supply a custom item by handling the event and setting the property of the parameter to the new item. 否則，此元件應該建立使用預設建構函式項目。Otherwise, the component should create an item using the default constructor. 3. 如果資料來源沒有實作介面，將項目立即加入基礎清單與資料來源。If the data source does not implement the interface, the item is immediately added to the data source and underlying list. 如果支援這個介面，然後加入已由交易和方法。If this interface is supported, then the addition is transacted by the and methods.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event BindingComplete As BindingCompleteEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於資料繫結作業完成時。

span.span: Occurs at the completion of a data-binding operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能包含下列資料繫結作業的完成之後發生的事件：The event occurs after the completion of a data-binding operation, which may include the following: - 將資訊從資料來源推送到其繫結控制項的屬性。Pushing information from the data source into the property of its bound control. - 提取資訊從繫結控制項至其相關聯的資料來源。Pulling information from a bound control into its associated data source. 請注意會引發這個事件，不論完成狀態的繫結作業中，雖然這個狀態可以檢查來判斷屬性與事件相關聯的參數。Note that this event is raised regardless of the completion status of the binding operation, although this status can be determined by examining the property of the parameter associated with the event. 也可能包含錯誤和例外狀況資訊。 may also contain error and exception information. 例如，在嘗試推播到資料來源的 null 值的繫結作業控制項將會產生例外狀況，因為不可`null`。For example, a binding operation that attempts to push a null value from a data source into a control will generate an exception, since a cannot be `null`. 在此情況下，繫結作業未順利完成，但是會引發取代事件，以及事件將包含在嘗試失敗的繫結資訊。In this case, although the binding operation does not successfully complete, the event will be raised, and the event will contain information on the failed binding attempt. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何處理事件，並確認其中一個控制項的值變更時繫結至相同的資料來源的多個控制項都能保持同步。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event and ensure multiple controls bound to the same data source remain synchronized when one of the control values is changed. 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼的 Windows Form 和呼叫`InitializeControlsAndData`從表單的建構函式的方法或事件處理方法。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and call the `InitializeControlsAndData` method from the form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMultipleControls#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMultipleControls/CS/Form1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMultipleControls#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMultipleControls/VB/Form1.vb#11)]

value.span: ，包含接受這個 管理的 物件。

span.span: A that contains the objects managed by this .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例取得特定資料來源。The following code example gets the for a specific data source. 然後此範例使用列印每個控制項的相關資訊的屬性繫結至相同的資料來源。The example then uses the property to print information about each control bound to the same data source. [!code-cpp[Classic BindingManagerBase.Bindings Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingManagerBase.Bindings Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic BindingManagerBase.Bindings Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingManagerBase.Bindings Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic BindingManagerBase.Bindings Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingManagerBase.Bindings Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CancelCurrentEdit() cil managed

summary.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，取消目前的編輯。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, cancels the current edit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法僅支援資料來源實作介面。This method is supported only if the data source implements the interface. 如果物件未實作介面，對資料進行的變更不會被捨棄。If the object does not implement the interface, changes made to the data will not be discarded. 呼叫方法會使發生的事件。Calling the method causes the event to occur. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範和方法。The following code example demonstrates both the and the methods. 當您呼叫方法，對資料進行的變更會被捨棄。When you call the methods, changes made to the data are discarded. 當您呼叫方法時，所做的變更會保留。When you call the method, the changes are kept. [!code-cpp[BindingManagerBase.CancelCurrentEdit Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BindingManagerBase.CancelCurrentEdit Example/CPP/canceledit.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[BindingManagerBase.CancelCurrentEdit Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BindingManagerBase.CancelCurrentEdit Example/CS/canceledit.cs#1)] [!code-vb[BindingManagerBase.CancelCurrentEdit Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BindingManagerBase.CancelCurrentEdit Example/VB/canceledit.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Count As Integer
public: abstract property int Count { int get(); };

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得 管理的資料列數目。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the number of rows managed by the .
The number of rows managed by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷所維護的資料列在清單中的最後一個項目。Use the property to determine the last item in the list of rows maintained by the . 若要移到最後一個項目，設定屬性減 1 的屬性值。To go to the last item, set the property to the property value minus 1. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示四種方法設定屬性。The following code example shows four methods that set the property. `MoveNext`方法屬性遞增量為 1。The `MoveNext` method increments the property by 1. `MovePrevious`方法遞減 1 的屬性。The `MovePrevious` method decrements the property by 1. `MoveFirst`方法屬性設定為 0。The `MoveFirst` method sets the property to 0. `MoveLast`方法屬性的值設定減 1 的屬性。The `MoveLast` method sets the property to the value of the property minus 1. [!code-cpp[Classic BindingManagerBase.Count Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingManagerBase.Count Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic BindingManagerBase.Count Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingManagerBase.Count Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic BindingManagerBase.Count Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingManagerBase.Count Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得目前物件。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the current object.
An that represents the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件中包含的資料來源中的目前項目值。The object contains the value of the current item in the data source. 若要使用目前的項目值，您必須轉換的項目所包含之物件的。To use the value of the current item, you must cast the item to the of the object contained by the . 例如，包含物件。For example, a contains objects. 若要判斷目前物件的類型，請使用和方法。To determine the type of the current object, use the and methods. > [!NOTE] > 當是， ，或，您實際上繫結至。When the is a , , or , you are actually binding to a . 因此，每個物件是物件。Consequently, each object is a object. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會列印值物件存放至中事件。The following code example prints the value of the object in a in the event. 這個範例假設資料來源是包含名為`CustName`。The example assumes the data source is a containing a named `CustName`. [!code-cpp[Classic BindingManagerBase.Current Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingManagerBase.Current Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic BindingManagerBase.Current Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingManagerBase.Current Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic BindingManagerBase.Current Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingManagerBase.Current Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CurrentChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 發生於目前繫結的項目變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the currently bound item changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時屬性變更或就會發生事件。The event is raised whenever the property changes or the event occurs. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會列印值物件存放至中事件。The following code example prints the value of the object in a in the event. 這個範例假設資料來源是包含名為`CustName`。The example assumes the data source is a containing a named `CustName`. [!code-cpp[Classic BindingManagerBase.Current Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingManagerBase.Current Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic BindingManagerBase.Current Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingManagerBase.Current Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic BindingManagerBase.Current Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingManagerBase.Current Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CurrentItemChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 發生於目前繫結的項目之狀態變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the state of the currently bound item changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中目前繫結項目狀態變更時，就會發生事件。The event occurs whenever there is a change in the state in the currently bound item. 如果此項目的屬性已變更或取代或移動項目本身，也可能會發生。This can occur if one of the properties of this item is changed or if the item itself is replaced or moved. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案，例如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然後將其命名執行個體`BindingManagerBase1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯事件。Then name the instance `BindingManagerBase1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#82](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#82)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#82](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#82)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event DataError As BindingManagerDataErrorEventHandler

summary.span: 當 以無訊息模式處理 時發生。

span.span: Occurs when an is silently handled by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件僅提供資訊，並報告 Common Language Specification (CLS)-僅相容的例外狀況。This event is informational and reports Common Language Specification (CLS)-compliant exceptions only. 若要判斷發生何種類型的例外狀況，處理這個事件，並檢查屬性。To determine what type of exception occurred, handle this event and check the property of the . 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案，例如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然後將其命名執行個體`BindingManagerBase1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯事件。Then name the instance `BindingManagerBase1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#83](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#83)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#83](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#83)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void EndCurrentEdit() cil managed

summary.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，結束目前的編輯。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, ends the current edit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法僅支援資料來源實作介面。This method is supported only if the data source implements the interface. 在此情況下，將儲存的變更。In that case, changes will be saved. 如果物件未實作介面，將不儲存資料所做的變更。If the object does not implement the interface, changes made to the data will not be saved. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範和方法。The following code example demonstrates both the and the methods. 當您呼叫方法，對資料進行的變更會被捨棄。When you call the methods, changes made to the data are discarded. 當您呼叫方法時，所做的變更會保留。When you call the method, the changes are kept. [!code-cpp[BindingManagerBase.CancelCurrentEdit Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BindingManagerBase.CancelCurrentEdit Example/CPP/canceledit.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[BindingManagerBase.CancelCurrentEdit Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BindingManagerBase.CancelCurrentEdit Example/CS/canceledit.cs#1)] [!code-vb[BindingManagerBase.CancelCurrentEdit Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BindingManagerBase.CancelCurrentEdit Example/VB/canceledit.vb#1)]

span.span: Gets the list of property descriptors for the data source.

A that represents the property descriptors for the binding.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法以傳回。The following code example uses the method to return a . 這個範例會列印和目前值使用方法。The example prints the and value of the current using the method of the . [!code-cpp[Classic BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection GetItemProperties (System.Collections.ArrayList dataSources, System.Collections.ArrayList listAccessors);

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract int Position { get; set; }
Public MustOverride Property Position As Integer
public: abstract property int Position { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得或設定控制項 (繫結至這個資料來源) 所指向基礎清單中的位置。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the position in the underlying list that controls bound to this data source point to.

value.span: 以零為起始的索引，指定基礎清單中的位置。

span.span: A zero-based index that specifies a position in the underlying list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來逐一查看所維護的基礎清單。Use the property to iterate through the underlying list maintained by the . 若要移至第一個項目，設定設為 0。To go to the first item, set the to 0. 若要移至清單的結尾，請設定值減 1 的屬性。To go to the end of the list, set the to the value of the property minus 1. 就會發生事件時屬性值變更。The event occurs when the property value changes. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示四種方法設定屬性。The following code example shows four methods that set the property. `MoveNext`方法屬性遞增量為 1。The `MoveNext` method increments the property by 1. `MovePrevious`方法遞減 1 的屬性。The `MovePrevious` method decrements the property by 1. `MoveFirst`方法屬性設定為 0，而`MoveLast`方法屬性的值設定減 1 的屬性。The `MoveFirst` method sets the property to 0, and the `MoveLast` method sets the property to the value of the property minus 1. [!code-cpp[Classic BindingManagerBase.Count Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingManagerBase.Count Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic BindingManagerBase.Count Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingManagerBase.Count Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic BindingManagerBase.Count Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingManagerBase.Count Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event PositionChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 發生於 屬性的值已變更後。

span.span: Occurs after the value of the property has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立，然後將它加入至集合和物件控制項。The following code example creates a , and then adds it to a collection of objects for a control. 此範例接著會取得資料來源，並且將加入的委派事件。The example then gets the for the data source and adds a delegate to the event. [!code-cpp[Classic BindingManagerBase.PositionChanged Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingManagerBase.PositionChanged Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic BindingManagerBase.PositionChanged Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingManagerBase.PositionChanged Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic BindingManagerBase.PositionChanged Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingManagerBase.PositionChanged Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void PullData() cil managed

summary.span: 從資料繫結程序的控制項取出資料送入資料來源，而不需傳回任何資訊。

span.span: Pulls data from the data-bound control into the data source, returning no information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會提取回資料來源的資訊從資料繫結控制項的程式設計的方式。The method is a programmatic way to pull information from the data-bound control back into the data source. 因為通常在控制項時，自動更新其繫結的資料來源焦點離開不需要標準控制項的作業。It is not required for standard operation of a control, since normally a control automatically updates its bound data source when focus leaves it. 引發視來源的事件和變更事件的資料。 raises the event and change events on the data source as appropriate.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void PushData() cil managed

summary.span: 將資料來源中的資料送入資料繫結的控制項，而不需傳回任何資訊。

span.span: Pushes data from the data source into the data-bound control, returning no information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是將資訊從資料來源推送至資料繫結控制項的程式設計的方式。The method is a programmatic way to push information from the data source into the data-bound control. 如果資料來源實作這個方法不需要介面，因為事件應該會自動讓控制項透過其 currency 管理員進行更新。This method is not required if the data source implements the interface, because the event should automatically cause the control to be updated through its currency manager. 如果這個方法發出時正在執行的操作，方法會立即傳回值是`true`。If this method is issued when a operation is being performed, the method returns immediately with a value of `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RemoveAt(int32 index) cil managed
Public MustOverride Sub RemoveAt (index As Integer)

span.span: The index of the row to delete.

summary.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，刪除位於基礎清單中指定索引處的資料列。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, deletes the row at the specified index from the underlying list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法依賴基礎資料來源來判斷方法的行為。The method relies on the underlying data source to determine how the method behaves. (請參閱類別支援的資料來源清單。)針對類別可實作， ，或、 以及做為強型別的類別可實作、方法實際上會刪除基礎的清單，而非移除它的內容中的資料列。(See the class for a list of supported data sources.) For classes that implement , , or , as well as strongly typed classes that implement , the method actually deletes the row in the underlying list instead of removing its contents. 如果基礎清單實作介面，屬性必須傳回`true`。If the underlying list implements the interface, the property must return `true`. 如果基礎清單實作介面，屬性必須傳回`false`。If the underlying list implements the interface, the property must return `false`. ## Examples [!code-cpp[BindingManagerBase_RemoveAt#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BindingManagerBase_RemoveAt/CPP/bindingmanagerbase_removeat.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[BindingManagerBase_RemoveAt#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BindingManagerBase_RemoveAt/CS/bindingmanagerbase_removeat.cs#1)] [!code-vb[BindingManagerBase_RemoveAt#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BindingManagerBase_RemoveAt/VB/bindingmanagerbase_removeat.vb#1)]

exception.span: 指定的 處並沒有資料列。

span.span: There is no row at the specified .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ResumeBinding() cil managed

summary.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，繼續資料繫結 (Data Binding)。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, resumes data binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和允許的暫止和繼續資料繫結的兩種方法。 and are two methods that allow the temporary suspension and resumption of data binding. 如果必須允許使用者編輯資料欄位發生驗證之前，您通常會暫止資料繫結。You would typically suspend data binding if the user must be allowed to edit data fields before validation occurs. 例如，使用者可能需要變更成符合第二個欄位; 的欄位否則，驗證的第一個欄位會導致錯誤的第二個欄位。For example, the user might need to change a field to be in accordance with a second field; otherwise, validating the first field would cause the second field to be in error. ## Examples [!code-cpp[BindingManagerBase_Suspend_Resume_Binding#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BindingManagerBase_Suspend_Resume_Binding/CPP/bindingmanagerbase_suspend_resume_binding.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[BindingManagerBase_Suspend_Resume_Binding#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BindingManagerBase_Suspend_Resume_Binding/CS/bindingmanagerbase_suspend_resume_binding.cs#2)] [!code-vb[BindingManagerBase_Suspend_Resume_Binding#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BindingManagerBase_Suspend_Resume_Binding/VB/bindingmanagerbase_suspend_resume_binding.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SuspendBinding() cil managed

summary.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，暫止資料繫結。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, suspends data binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和允許的暫止和繼續資料繫結的兩種方法。 and are two methods that allow the temporary suspension and resumption of data binding. 如果必須允許使用者編輯資料欄位發生驗證之前，您通常會暫止資料繫結。You would typically suspend data binding if the user must be allowed to edit data fields before validation occurs. 例如，使用者可能需要變更成符合第二個欄位; 的欄位否則，驗證的第一個欄位會導致錯誤的第二個欄位。For example, the user might need to change a field to be in accordance with a second field; otherwise, validating the first field would cause the second field to be in error. ## Examples [!code-cpp[BindingManagerBase_Suspend_Resume_Binding#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BindingManagerBase_Suspend_Resume_Binding/CPP/bindingmanagerbase_suspend_resume_binding.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[BindingManagerBase_Suspend_Resume_Binding#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BindingManagerBase_Suspend_Resume_Binding/CS/bindingmanagerbase_suspend_resume_binding.cs#2)] [!code-vb[BindingManagerBase_Suspend_Resume_Binding#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BindingManagerBase_Suspend_Resume_Binding/VB/bindingmanagerbase_suspend_resume_binding.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void UpdateIsBinding() cil managed

summary.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，更新繫結。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, updates the binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會更新繫結的控制項和其資料來源之間的資料繫結。The method updates the data binding between the bound control and its data source. 複雜資料繫結案例中，它也會重設目前的位置加入基礎清單的開頭。For complex data-binding scenarios, it also resets the current position to the beginning of the underlying list.
